SYN_PT_0_8: After obtaining informed consent, we brought the patient to the procedure room. General anesthesia was administered. We inspected the central airways and found no endobronchial lesions. Using the ultrathin bronchoscope, we targeted the left lower lobe. The radial EBUS probe confirmed the location of the nodule with a concentric return. We then passed biopsy forceps and a brush to collect samples.
